scripts.postinstall: npx puppeteer browsers install chrome || echo 'Chrome installation skipped - using system chrome'
scripts.setup-help: echo 'Setup Instructions:' && echo '1. Create Supabase project at https://supabase.com' && echo '2. Run scripts/setup-supabase.sql in Supabase SQL Editor' && echo '3. Add Supabase credentials to .env file'
